name: ICE RINK RALLY
description:
You know what it's like: 

You head out with your buddies for a fun night out at the local ice rink, but there are so many slow, clumsy people on the ice that they get in the way of your races!

The more you have - the worse it is!

Controls - WASD to move your dude around the ice as quickly as possible.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 40 using Unity 5 and GIMP.
